name: Blob - Explorer - Select a file - Top menu - New notebook - load to Dataframe - txt

source:
%%pyspark
blob_account_name = "bdbjblobstorageqingtest"
blob_container_name = "container02"
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

sc = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("AzureBlobStorage")

spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)
df = spark.read.load('wasbs://container02@bdbjblobstorageqingtest.blob.core.windows.net/New folder 1220/SearchLog.txt', format='text')
df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable("default.YourTableName")
